name: Night Terror
description:
Keyboard and Mouse Controls:

Walk: ASWD

Swing Pencil Crayon: Space

Switch Pencil Crayon Color: E

Use Key: V

 (Controller is supported as well and the controls are shown in-game)

The second project for our IVGD Program's Level Design class. 

An action-adventure level about a little boy navigating his house in his nightmare, and combating his ghosts.
